engineer.title: Hello.
engineer.subtitle: I love to make things happen by using modern technologies.
engineer.methodology: We will do it from profound analysis and design, through implementation, to the testing and reviewing phase in reiterated sprints until we reach final release and maintenance.
engineer.what-i-do: I provide custom software to suit the needs and help to build your business, together making your investment grow.

security.title: Security.
security.subtitle: Secure solutions ensured
security.trait: As you may know, security is one of the most crucial fundamentals of a running business.
security.advantage: With best coding practices, analysis, and penetration testing services, your data will be secure in cyberspace.

check-out-source.i-want-to-see: I want to see the source code
check-out-source.you-can-check-out: You can check out the source code of this website in the Github repository.
